name: Music Heroes Free
description:
- Music Heroes Free is free version of Music Heroes Pro.
- Music Heroes Free is the most music game and the only music rhythm game that you can play with your own music!
- Music Heroes Free is music games, simulated guitar for those who want to feel free to play your favorite music. You can play your favorite music inspired by the falling notes on the screen.
- You can play with the preload songs or your local music files by your favorite artists. Music Heroes Pro includes a brand new visual experience with beautiful lighting effects and animations.
- You can choose 3 difficulty levels.

Features:
- Support local MP3 music files
- Easy, Normal and Hard difficulty levels
- Visually striking user interface

- Try this incredible game that will keep you entertained for a long time!
